gluster-block Insecure Logging Local Password Disclosure 239598 - gluster-block Insecure Logging Local Password Disclosure  Description gluster-block that is triggered as sensitive information is insecurely logged in plaintext. This may allow a local attacker to disclose gluster-block password information.    CVEs CVE-2020-10762    References https://seclists.org/oss-sec/2020/q3/207 (Mail List Post) https://github.com/gluster/gluster-block/releases/tag/v0.5.1 (Vendor Specific News/Changelog Entry) https://github.com/gluster/gluster-block/pull/280 (Vendor Specific Solution URL) RHSA-2020:4143 (RedHat RHSA)    Affected Vendors Red Hat

Heketi executors/cmdexec/block_volume.go Insecure Logging Local Password Disclosure 239599 - Heketi executors/cmdexec/block_volume.go Insecure Logging Local Password Disclosure  Description Heketi contains a flaw in executors/cmdexec/block_volume.go that is triggered as sensitive information is insecurely logged in plaintext. This may allow a local attacker to disclose gluster-block password information.    CVEs CVE-2020-10763    References https://github.com/heketi/heketi/pull/1790 (Vendor Specific Solution URL) https://github.com/heketi/heketi/releases/tag/v10.1.0 (Vendor Specific News/Changelog Entry) https://seclists.org/oss-sec/2020/q3/208 (Mail List Post) RHSA-2020:4143 (RedHat RHSA)    Affected Vendors Heketi; Red Hat

Apache Ant Insecure Temporary File Handling Local Issue 239600 - Apache Ant Insecure Temporary File Handling Local Issue  Description Apache Ant contains a flaw that is triggered as the application uses the default temporary directory identified by the Java system property 'java.io.tmpdir'. This may allow a local attacker to gain access to potentially sensitive information or modify source files that are copied back to the build tree.    CVEs CVE-2020-11979    References http://ant.apache.org/security.html (Vendor Specific Advisory URL) https://seclists.org/oss-sec/2020/q3/209 (Mail List Post)    Affected Vendors The Apache Software Foundation

Security Bulletin: Open Source Apache Tomcat vulnerabilities affect IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager (CVE-2020-13935)  Multiple vulnerabilities in Open Source Apache Tomcat reported by The Apache Software Foundation affect IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager (TADDM)  Affected product(s) and affected version(s):    Affected Product(s) Version(s)   IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager 7.3.0.0      Refer to the following reference URLs for remediation and additional vulnerability details:   Source Bulletin:  https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6339627  The post Security Bulletin: Open Source Apache Tomcat vulnerabilities affect IBM Tivoli Application Dependency Discovery Manager (CVE-2020-13935) appeared first on IBM PSIRT Blog.

Security Bulletin: IBM Cloud Pak  System is affected by a vulnerability in VMware component   A vulnerability is reported in the VMWare component, and this component is used by IBM Cloud Pak System.  IBM Cloud Pak System  addressed  applicable CVE.  Affected product(s) and affected version(s):    Affected Product(s) Version(s)   IBM Cloud Pak System v2.2.6, v2.3.0.1,  v2.3.1.1, v2.3.2.0      Refer to the following reference URLs for remediation and additional vulnerability details:   Source Bulletin:  https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6329019  The post Security Bulletin: IBM Cloud Pak  System is affected by a vulnerability in VMware component appeared first on IBM PSIRT Blog.

Security Bulletin: Vulnerability in IBM Java Runtime affect IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager  A vulnerability in IBM® Runtime Environment Java Version 8 used by IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager. IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager has addressed the applicable CVEs. This issue was disclosed as part of the IBM Java SDK updates in October 2019.  Affected product(s) and affected version(s):    Affected Product(s) Version(s)   IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager < 1.1.8      Refer to the following reference URLs for remediation and additional vulnerability details:   Source Bulletin:  https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6339619  The post Security Bulletin: Vulnerability in IBM Java Runtime affect IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager appeared first on IBM PSIRT Blog.

Security Bulletin: App Connect Enterprise Certified Container is affected by multiple Node.js vulnerabilities  App Connect Enterprise Certified Container is vulnerable to CVE-2020-10531, CVE-2020-11080, CVE-2020-8174, CVE-2020-8172 in Node.js  Affected product(s) and affected version(s):    Affected Product(s) Version(s)   App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 1.0.0 with Operator   App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 1.0.1 with Operator   App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 1.0.2 with Operator      Refer to the following reference URLs for remediation and additional vulnerability details:   Source Bulletin:  https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6339567  The post Security Bulletin: App Connect Enterprise Certified Container is affected by multiple Node.js vulnerabilities appeared first on IBM PSIRT Blog.

Affected product(s) and affected version(s):    Affected Product(s) Version(s)   IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager < 1.1.8      Refer to the following reference URLs for remediation and additional vulnerability details:   Source Bulletin:  https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6339733  The post Security Bulletin: A vulnerability in Netty affects IBM Netcool Agile Service Manager appeared first on IBM PSIRT Blog.

Affected product(s) and affected version(s):    Affected Product(s) Version(s)   IBM Secure Proxy 6.0.1 6.0.1   IBM Sterling Secure Proxy 3.4.3.2      Refer to the following reference URLs for remediation and additional vulnerability details:   Source Bulletin:  https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/6339801  The post Security Bulletin: Vulnerability in Apache Commons Codec Affects IBM Sterling Secure Proxy appeared first on IBM PSIRT Blog.

Cisco IOS XE Software Web UI Authorization Bypass (cisco-sa-webui-auth-bypass-6j2BYUc7)        Nessus Plugin ID 141083 with Medium Severity Synopsis The remote device is missing a vendor-supplied security patch (cisco-sa-webui-auth-bypass-6j2BYUc7) Description According to its self-reported version, Cisco IOS XE Software is affected by a Web UI authorization bypass vulnerability due to insufficient authorization of web UI access requests. An authenticated, remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a crafted HTTP request to the web UI. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to utilize parts of the web UI for which they are not authorized. This could allow a Read-Only user to perform actions of an Admin user. Please see the included Cisco BID and Cisco Security Advisory for more information. Solution Upgrade to the relevant fixed version referenced in Cisco bug ID CSCva31948 Read more at https://www.tenable.com/plugins/nessus/141083

Chrome Beta for Android Update    Hi everyone! We've just released Chrome Beta 86 (86.0.4240.68) for Android: it's now available on Google Play.You can see a partial list of the changes in the Git log. For details on new features, check out the Chromium blog, and for details on web platform updates, check here.If you find a new issue, please let us know by filing a bug.Krishna GovindGoogle Chrome

[RHSA-2020:3842-01] Moderate: OpenShift Container Platform 4.5.13 openshift-enterprise-console-container security update -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE----- Hash: SHA256  =====================================================================                    Red Hat Security Advisory  Synopsis:          Moderate: OpenShift Container Platform 4.5.13 openshift-enterprise-console-container security update Advisory ID:       RHSA-2020:3842-01 Product:           Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise Advisory URL:      https://access.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2020:3842 Issue date:        2020-09-30 CVE Names:         CVE-2016-2183  =====================================================================  1. Summary:  An update for openshift-enterprise-console-container is now available for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.5.  Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Moderate. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.  2. Description:  Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform is Red Hat's cloud computing Kubernetes application platform solution designed for on-premise or private cloud deployments.  Security Fix(es):  * SSL/TLS: Birthday attack against 64-bit block ciphers (SWEET32) (CVE-2016-2183)  For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.  3. Solution:  For OpenShift Container Platform 4.5 see the following documentation, which will be updated shortly for this release, for important instructions on how to upgrade your cluster and fully apply this asynchronous errata update:  https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.5/release_notes/ocp-4-5-rel ease-notes.html  Details on how to access this content are available at https://docs.openshift.com/container-platform/4.5/updating/updating-cluster - -cli.html.  4. Bugs fixed (https://bugzilla.redhat.com/):  1369383 - CVE-2016-2183 SSL/TLS: Birthday attack against 64-bit block ciphers (SWEET32)  5. References:  https://access.redhat.com/security/cve/CVE-2016-2183 https://access.redhat.com/security/updates/classification/#moderate https://access.redhat.com/articles/2548661  6. Contact:  The Red Hat security contact is <secalert@redhat.com>. More contact details at https://access.redhat.com/security/team/contact/  Copyright 2020 Red Hat, Inc. -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE----- Version: GnuPG v1  iQIVAwUBX3UgD9zjgjWX9erEAQha0g/8CJMiazF6XkfJUomEqOEN5lkGWD2Wyc/T id9P1wSWXtW8FAUZYjpRWN0Tanah24bk/X5awzeN3AkSuh9c30+ge3IBYBOao7dm qVNMFaGpDkOFMO6qAh3K4Hb/9OqpQp01+0PjV1ZOuTlGYims75SUqIYXGzJjhS8C p++fkhUSYauMFmseShcWmEXLPEJEA28aJIAOQMeZlDW8D5sKb2NdxGZqgH1/7kFh g7gb3pYhW28XvBEUQSiT1lRxYIYPj/8qu1CiTCqojdVXVM9lWbCUwaFwigZghYZS yKTxm+wOGwGUuFtnVfemNKY1sytkvVXYatifsQxPoSsc/CmLaybgmoHSHOBJA71K ziGlpVkYUO0FkU4pL2a2NpC8MBBkURpKneDfbX2nJoayhnMyim3Knx9aS6inxXJd XUeTc+HgG96A1P7TKGteV3bS26+tZNR8lgitqhQ9wzXv9taKGUnFPy4W2A+mmUsR CuajXOf6hCIHKqHONQs0lq5oTbcWr6I4Fh7qPNLVltmUh99h/zZ0Itz5l5qwGEyI CNgHP6wN0O0M6cZNadcD+cSqGYeVP1KqUJrixRxMargBAmMRXrQByLOlYgsyCloK +NrYaIvpNcws8jA/VhY8GAzVe6Z6JqpQFpdd9I+ThGhSxnIikb2RlkgP1fGCQt/J Zc6MO+I97Ko= =6pv+ -----END PGP SIGNATURE-----  -- RHSA-announce mailing list RHSA-announce@redhat.com https://www.redhat.com/mailman/listinfo/rhsa-announce

SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /fusion/index.php Error Message Remote Username Enumeration 239602 - SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /fusion/index.php Error Message Remote Username Enumeration  Description SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage contains a flaw in the /fusion/index.php script that is due to different error messages being returned from failed authentication attempts for incorrect usernames versus incorrect passwords. This may allow a remote attacker to enumerate username information.    CVEs     References https://www.zeroscience.mk/en/vulnerabilities/ZSL-2020-5591.php (Other Advisory URL) 48847 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors SpinetiX

SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /index.php Admin User Creation CSRF 239603 - SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /index.php Admin User Creation CSRF  Description SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage contains a flaw as HTTP requests to /index.php do not require multiple steps, explicit confirmation, or a unique token when performing certain sensitive actions. By tricking a user into following a specially crafted link, a context-dependent attacker can perform a Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF / XSRF) attack causing the victim to create administrative users.    CVEs     References https://www.zeroscience.mk/en/vulnerabilities/ZSL-2020-5592.php (Other Advisory URL) 48846 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors SpinetiX

SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /content/files/backups/ Direct Request Handling Remote Database Backup Disclosure 239604 - SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /content/files/backups/ Direct Request Handling Remote Database Backup Disclosure  Description SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage contains a flaw that is triggered as direct requests for /content/files/backups/ are not properly restricted. This may allow a remote attacker to disclose sensitive information within database backups.    CVEs     References https://www.zeroscience.mk/en/vulnerabilities/ZSL-2020-5593.php (Other Advisory URL) 48845 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors SpinetiX

InfoCage SiteShell for IIS / Apache Service Executable Insecure Permissions Local Privilege Escalation 239601 - InfoCage SiteShell for IIS / Apache Service Executable Insecure Permissions Local Privilege Escalation  Description InfoCage SiteShell for IIS and Apache contain a flaw that is triggered as service executables are installed with insecure permissions. This may allow a local attacker to make changes to the executable files and gain elevated privileges.    CVEs CVE-2020-5632    References http://jvn.jp/en/jp/JVN07426151/index.html (Other Advisory URL) https://jvndb.jvn.jp/en/contents/2020/JVNDB-2020-000066.html (Other Advisory URL) http://jvn.jp/jp/JVN07426151/index.html (Other Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors NEC Corporation

SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /fusion/index.php Multiple Parameter Path Traversal Remote File Manipulation 239605 - SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage /fusion/index.php Multiple Parameter Path Traversal Remote File Manipulation  Description SpinetiX Fusion Digital Signage contains a flaw that allows traversing outside of a restricted path. The issue is due to the /fusion/index.php script not properly sanitizing input, specifically path traversal style attacks (e.g. '../') supplied via the 'SystemBackup[name]' POST parameter and 'id' GET parameter. With a specially crafted request, an authenticated remote attacker can create backup files or delete arbitrary files and images.    CVEs     References https://www.zeroscience.mk/en/vulnerabilities/ZSL-2020-5594.php (Other Advisory URL) 48844 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors SpinetiX

BrightSign Digital Signage /speedtest Server-side Request Forgery (SSRF) 239606 - BrightSign Digital Signage /speedtest Server-side Request Forgery (SSRF)  Description BrightSign Digital Signage contains a flaw related to request handling between a user and a server, where the server can be induced into performing unintended actions (Server Side Request Forgery aka SSRF). By sending a specially crafted request to the /speedtest script, the server can be used to conduct host-based attacks. This may allow a remote attacker to bypass access restrictions (e.g. host or network ACLs), conduct port scanning of internal networks, enumerate internal hosts, or possibly invoke additional protocols (e.g. Gopher, TFTP) which may give additional control over such requests.    CVEs     References https://www.zeroscience.mk/en/vulnerabilities/ZSL-2020-5595.php (Other Advisory URL) 48843 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors BrightSign, LLC

Sitecore JSS React Sample Application Unspecified Remote Cross-user Page Content Disclosure 239607 - Sitecore JSS React Sample Application Unspecified Remote Cross-user Page Content Disclosure  Description Sitecore JSS React Sample Application contains an unspecified flaw which may allow an authenticated remote attacker to disclose sensitive page content intended for another user. No further details have been provided.    CVEs     References https://kb.sitecore.net/articles/750906 (Vendor Specific Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Sitecore

Matomo Insecure Plaintext Storage Local Token Disclosure 239608 - Matomo Insecure Plaintext Storage Local Token Disclosure  Description Matomo contains a flaw that is triggered as sensitive tokens are insecurely stored in plaintext within the database. This may allow a local attacker to disclose 'token_auth' and session ID information.    CVEs     References https://matomo.org/changelog/matomo-4-0-0-b2/ (Vendor Specific News/Changelog Entry)    Affected Vendors Matomo.org

Re-Desk HelpDesk protected/models/MessageAttachment.php .htaccess File Overwrite Remote Code Execution Weakness 239611 - Re-Desk HelpDesk protected/models/MessageAttachment.php .htaccess File Overwrite Remote Code Execution Weakness  Description Re-Desk HelpDesk contains a flaw in protected/models/MessageAttachment.php that is triggered as file types and extensions for uploaded files are not properly validated before being placed in a web-accessible path. This may allow a remote attacker to overwrite the .htaccess file and upload a specially crafted file and then request it in order to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the web service.    CVEs CVE-2020-15488    References https://labs.f-secure.com/advisories/redesk-v2-3-multiple-issues/ (Other Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Ticketing System Support Service Desk & Customer Help Desk Software

Stealth Solution Enterprise Manager Unspecified Search Local Credential Disclosure 239612 - Stealth Solution Enterprise Manager Unspecified Search Local Credential Disclosure  Description Stealth Solution contains an unspecified flaw related to the Enterprise Manager's search functionality which may allow a local attacker to disclose credential information. No further details have been provided.    CVEs CVE-2020-24620    References https://public.support.unisys.com/common/public/vulnerability/NVD_Detail_Rpt.aspx?ID=56 (Vendor Specific Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Unisys

Re-Desk HelpDesk protected/controllers/TicketController.php getBaseCriteria() Function folder Parameter Blind SQL Injection 239609 - Re-Desk HelpDesk protected/controllers/TicketController.php getBaseCriteria() Function folder Parameter Blind SQL Injection  Description Re-Desk HelpDesk contains a flaw that may allow carrying out a bklind SQL injection attack. The issue is due to the getBaseCriteria() function in the protected/controllers/TicketController.php script not properly sanitizing input to the 'folder' GET parameter. This may allow a remote attacker to inject or manipulate SQL queries in the back-end database, allowing for the manipulation or disclosure of arbitrary data.    CVEs CVE-2020-15487    References https://labs.f-secure.com/advisories/redesk-v2-3-multiple-issues/ (Other Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Ticketing System Support Service Desk & Customer Help Desk Software

BearShare Lite Advanced Search Keywords Field Local Buffer Overflow Weakness 239613 - BearShare Lite Advanced Search Keywords Field Local Buffer Overflow Weakness  Description BearShare Lite contains an overflow condition that is triggered as certain input is not properly validated when passed to the 'Keywords' field in the Advanced Search feature. This may allow a local attacker to cause a buffer overflow, resulting in a denial of service or potentially allowing the execution of arbitrary code.    CVEs     References https://0day.today/exploit/34982 (Other Advisory URL) 48839 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors BearShare

Re-Desk HelpDesk protected/controllers/SettingsController.php actionEmailTemplates() Function account_id Parameter Blind SQL Injection 239610 - Re-Desk HelpDesk protected/controllers/SettingsController.php actionEmailTemplates() Function account_id Parameter Blind SQL Injection  Description Re-Desk HelpDesk contains a flaw that may allow carrying out a blind SQL injection attack. The issue is due to the actionEmailTemplates() function in the protected/controllers/SettingsController.php script not properly sanitizing input to the 'account_id' GET parameter. This may allow an authenticated remote attacker to inject or manipulate SQL queries in the back-end database, allowing for the manipulation or disclosure of arbitrary data.    CVEs CVE-2020-15849    References https://labs.f-secure.com/advisories/redesk-v2-3-multiple-issues/ (Other Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Ticketing System Support Service Desk & Customer Help Desk Software

Fedora 33: community-mysql 2020-77b95c868f> Update built with the new CMake settings Number of files which should have been owned by the testsuite subpackage are now owned by it Started building MeCab plugin

xen-4.13.1-6.fc32 FEDORA-2020-f668e579be Packages in this update:  xen-4.13.1-6.fc32  Update description: x86 pv: Crash when handling guest access to MSR_MISC_ENABLE [XSA-333, CVE-2020-25602] (#1881619) Missing unlock in XENMEM_acquire_resource error path [XSA-334, CVE-2020-25598] (#1881616) race when migrating timers between x86 HVM vCPU-s [XSA-336, CVE-2020-25604] (#1881618) PCI passthrough code reading back hardware registers [XSA-337, CVE-2020-25595] (#1881587) once valid event channels may not turn invalid [XSA-338, CVE-2020-25597] (#1881588) x86 pv guest kernel DoS via SYSENTER [XSA-339, CVE-2020-25596] (#1881617) Missing memory barriers when accessing/allocating an event channel [XSA-340, CVE-2020-25603] (#1881583) out of bounds event channels available to 32-bit x86 domains [XSA-342, CVE-2020-25600] (#1881582) races with evtchn_reset() [XSA-343, CVE-2020-25599] (#1881581) lack of preemption in evtchn_reset() / evtchn_destroy() [XSA-344, CVE-2020-25601] (#1881586)

Array_queue pop_back() Function Circular Queue Improper Indexing Use-after-free Memory Disclosure 239614 - Array_queue pop_back() Function Circular Queue Improper Indexing Use-after-free Memory Disclosure  Description Array_queue contains a use-after-free error in the pop_back() function. The issue is triggered as indexing is not performed on arrays wrapped with circular queues. This may allow an attacker to dereference already freed memory and disclose memory contents.    CVEs     References https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0047.html (Other Advisory URL) https://github.com/raviqqe/array-queue/issues/2 (Bug Tracker)    Affected Vendors Yota Toyama

Ws-rs Outoging Buffer Improper Growth Handling Memory Exhaustion DoS 239615 - Ws-rs Outoging Buffer Improper Growth Handling Memory Exhaustion DoS  Description Ws-rs contains a flaw that is triggered as the outgoing buffer of a single connection is not properly checked and restricted. This may allow a context-dependent attacker to cause a process linked against the library to exhaust available memory resources.    CVEs     References https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0043.html (Vendor Specific Advisory URL) https://github.com/housleyjk/ws-rs/issues/291 (Bug Tracker) https://github.com/housleyjk/ws-rs (Vendor URL) https://github.com/housleyjk/ws-rs/pull/328/files (Vendor Specific Solution URL)    Affected Vendors Jim Housley

Philips Clinical Collaboration Platform Portal Multiple Unspecified Issues 239617 - Philips Clinical Collaboration Platform Portal Multiple Unspecified Issues  Description Philips Clinical Collaboration Platform Portal contains multiple unspecified flaws related to input validation, resource allocation limitation, access configuration, and other unspecified issues. This may allow an attacker to execute unauthorized actions or disclose sensitive information that can be used in further attacks against the system. No further details have been provided.    CVEs     References https://www.usa.philips.com/healthcare/about/customer-support/product-security (Vendor Specific Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Philips

HashiCorp Vault TTL Batch Token Lease Persistence Remote Issue 239616 - HashiCorp Vault TTL Batch Token Lease Persistence Remote Issue  Description HashiCorp Vault contains a flaw that is triggered as expiration time is not correctly scheduled, which can cause batch token leases to outlive their TTL. This may allow a remote attacker to retain access that should have expired.    CVEs CVE-2020-25816    References https://www.hashicorp.com/blog/category/vault/ (Other Advisory URL) https://github.com/hashicorp/vault/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#154 (Vendor Specific News/Changelog Entry)    Affected Vendors HashiCorp

Centreon www/include/common/autoNumLimit.php limit Parameter SQL Injection 239619 - Centreon www/include/common/autoNumLimit.php limit Parameter SQL Injection  Description Centreon contains a flaw that may allow carrying out an SQL injection attack. The issue is due to the www/include/common/autoNumLimit.php script not properly sanitizing input to the 'limit' POST or GET parameter. This may allow a remote attacker to inject or manipulate SQL queries in the back-end database, allowing for the manipulation or disclosure of arbitrary data.    CVEs     References https://github.com/centreon/centreon/pull/8952 (Vendor Specific Solution URL) https://github.com/centreon/centreon/commit/642ee380e5e0a8e2efb7444cd35b6df49cb86b61 (Vendor Specific Solution URL)    Affected Vendors Centreon

Centreon www/include/monitoring/downtime/listDowntime.php Multiple Parameter SQL Injection 239620 - Centreon www/include/monitoring/downtime/listDowntime.php Multiple Parameter SQL Injection  Description Centreon contains a flaw that may allow carrying out an SQL injection attack. The issue is due to the www/include/monitoring/downtime/listDowntime.php script not properly sanitizing input to the 'search_service', 'search_host', 'search_output', and 'search_author' parameters in a POST or GET request. This may allow a remote attacker to inject or manipulate SQL queries in the back-end database, allowing for the manipulation or disclosure of arbitrary data.    CVEs     References https://github.com/centreon/centreon/pull/8952 (Vendor Specific Solution URL) https://github.com/centreon/centreon/commit/642ee380e5e0a8e2efb7444cd35b6df49cb86b61 (Vendor Specific Solution URL)    Affected Vendors Centreon

WebsiteBaker /admin/pages/add.php Page Creation Remote Code Execution 239621 - WebsiteBaker /admin/pages/add.php Page Creation Remote Code Execution  Description WebsiteBaker contains a flaw in the /admin/pages/add.php script that is triggered as input passed to new pages is not properly sanitized. This may allow an authenticated remote attacker to create a new page and then request it in order to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the web service.    CVEs     References 48838 (Exploit Database)    Affected Vendors WebsiteBaker Org e.V.

Oniguruma src/regcomp.c concat_opt_exact_str() Function Regular Expression Handling Out-of-bounds Write Issue 239618 - Oniguruma src/regcomp.c concat_opt_exact_str() Function Regular Expression Handling Out-of-bounds Write Issue  Description Oniguruma contains an out-of-bounds write flaw in the concat_opt_exact_str() function in src/regcomp.c that is triggered during the handling of a specially crafted regular expression which may allow a context-dependent attacker to have an unspecified impact.    CVEs CVE-2020-26159    References https://github.com/kkos/oniguruma/commit/cbe9f8bd9cfc6c3c87a60fbae58fa1a85db59df0 (Vendor Specific Solution URL) https://github.com/kkos/oniguruma/issues/207 (Vendor Specific Advisory URL) https://seclists.org/oss-sec/2020/q3/210 (Mail List Post)    Affected Vendors K.Kosako

BigBlueButton Greenlight app/controllers/application_controller.rb Host / Origin Header Injection Password-reset Link Spoofing 239622 - BigBlueButton Greenlight app/controllers/application_controller.rb Host / Origin Header Injection Password-reset Link Spoofing  Description BigBlueButton Greenlight contains a flaw in app/controllers/application_controller.rb that is triggered as HTTP headers from unknown hosts and origins are not properly restricted. This may allow a context-dependent attacker to spoof a valid password-reset link.    CVEs CVE-2020-26163    References https://www.sakshamanand.com/host-header-injection-bigbluebutton/ (Other Advisory URL) https://github.com/bigbluebutton/greenlight/pull/1543 (Vendor Specific Solution URL) https://github.com/bigbluebutton/greenlight/releases/tag/release-2.5.6 (Vendor Specific News/Changelog Entry)    Affected Vendors BigBlueButton Developer

HFish Honey Pot Password Field Stored XSS 239623 - HFish Honey Pot Password Field Stored XSS  Description HFish Honey Pot contains a flaw that allows a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack. This flaw exists because the program does not properly sanitize input to the password field before returning it to users. This may allow a remote attacker to create a specially crafted request that executes arbitrary script code in a user's browser session within the trust relationship between their browser and the server.    CVEs CVE-2020-22481    References https://github.com/hacklcx/HFish/issues/69#event-3221434666 (Vendor Specific Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors HFish

Nacos Improper Access Control Remote Service Detail Disclosure 239624 - Nacos Improper Access Control Remote Service Detail Disclosure  Description Nacos contains a flaw that is triggered as access controls are not properly implemented. This may allow a remote attacker to setup an environment and disclose service detail information.    CVEs CVE-2020-19676    References https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/issues/2284 (Vendor Specific Advisory URL)    Affected Vendors Alibaba

Leanote Desktop js/app/note.js Syncing Note Title Handling XSS 239625 - Leanote Desktop js/app/note.js Syncing Note Title Handling XSS  Description Leanote Desktop contains a flaw that allows a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack. This flaw exists because the js/app/note.js script does not properly sanitize input to note titles during syncing before returning it to users. This may allow a remote attacker to create a specially crafted request that executes arbitrary script code in a user's browser session within the trust relationship between their browser and the server.    CVEs CVE-2020-26157    References https://github.com/leanote/desktop-app/issues/353 (Bug Tracker)    Affected Vendors Leanote
